name: we_cant_think_of_a_name_soen341-project_f24
description: This project is a **Peer Assessment System** designed for university team projects, allowing students to evaluate their teammates' contributions across four key dimensions: Cooperation, Conceptual Contribution, Practical Contribution, and Work Ethic. It promotes accountability and provides valuable feedback to both students and instructors on team dynamics and individual efforts.

scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm build
